## Checklist

Please confirm the following before submitting:

### General Requirements
- [ ] I have read [CONTRIBUTING.md](../CONTRIBUTING.md)
- [ ] My changes follow the repository's style and structure
- [ ] I have tested my changes (if applicable)
- [ ] I have updated relevant documentation

### Academic Standards
- [ ] My changes maintain academic rigor and accuracy
- [ ] Any new citations follow proper academic format
- [ ] I have not altered the core theoretical content without discussion
- [ ] I have provided justification for substantive changes

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated CHANGELOG.md (if applicable)
- [ ] I have added necessary comments or explanations
- [ ] README.md has been updated if needed

## For Repository Maintainer

### Review Checklist
- [ ] Changes are appropriate for this repository
- [ ] Academic standards maintained
- [ ] Documentation updated
- [ ] No conflicts with existing content
- [ ] Version number update needed (if applicable)
- [ ] Zenodo update required (if applicable)

### Action Items
- [ ] Merge
- [ ] Request changes
- [ ] Close with explanation

---

**Note**: This repository contains a published academic paper. Pull requests that substantially alter theoretical content will generally not be accepted. Such changes should be proposed through Issues or Discussions first, or as independent derivative work that cites this paper.
